original_text: So the Israelites did as Joshua commanded them. They took twelve stones from the middle of the Jordan, according to the number of the tribes of the Israelites, as the Lord had told Joshua; and they carried them over with them to their camp, where they put them down.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들이 여호수아가 명령한 대로 행하되 여호와께서 여호수아에게 이르신 대로 이스라엘 자손들의 지파의 수를 따라 요단 가운데에서 돌 열둘을 택하여 자기들이 유숙할 곳으로 가져다가 거기에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: So the Israelites did as Joshua commanded them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 이스라엘 사람들은 여호수아가 명령한 대로 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took twelve stones from the middle of the Jordan,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 요단강 가운데서 열두 돌을 가져왔고,

sentences.original_text: according to the number of the tribes of the Israelites,
as the Lord had told Joshua;
and they carried them over with them to their camp,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 돌들을 자신들의 진영으로 가져갔고,
